description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Outrun your friends, escape from the police, avoid pigs, destroy your opponents, smash into zombies, drag a giant safe, take down the transporter, help your team member and weave through the traffic ... but never slow down.  SlowDown is an arcade style racing game and features: - 5 unique tracks - Different times of day and weather conditions - 9 funny game modes - 4 players
